nodes.text: A Saber Trainer was an expert in the ways of the lightsaber and instructed other individuals in its usage. During the First Order/Resistance War, several Saber Trainers served aboard the Halcyon, an MPO-1400 Star Cruiser operated by Chandrila Star Line.

Saber Trainers are set to appear in the interactive hotel experience Star Wars: Galactic Starcruiser, scheduled to open in 2022 at the Walt Disney World Resort. In audition sides provided by The Walt Disney Company for the roles, the Saber Trainers mention and directly quote Dejammy Shallon, a character created by Greg Rucka in his novel Guardians of the Whills.
